component.name: RetroArch
component.summary: Frontend for emulators, game engines and media players

screenshot.caption: RetroArch running Sheep It Up on the Gameboy

description.p: RetroArch enables you to run classic games on a wide range of computers and consoles through its slick graphical interface. Settings are also unified so configuration is done once and for all.

It enables you to run classic games on a wide range of computers and consoles through its slick graphical interface. Settings are also unified so configuration is done once and for all. RetroArch has advanced features like shaders, netplay, rewinding, next-frame response times, runahead, and more!
